name: New Frontier (itch)
description:
The New Frontier is an arcade style shooter. You play as Spaceman Jack, an intergalactic space explorer. You were tasked with exploring a planet that is rumored to have been taken over by evil robots. You travel to the system that the planet is located at when you come across an enemy fleet. Your first mission, escape the enemy fleet and land on the robot planet. To find your way to the planet, just follow the stars. Stars gives you points, and everyone knows how much gamers love their collectables. Finally, you arrive on the planet when, oh no! An alien aircraft has knocked you clean out of the sky, but you won’t let that stop you. The scary evil robots approaching your position just might. Second mission, survive the enemy wave and find a new ship. But wait a second. It seems that all of your money has been scattered around the level. Better collect those before those greedy robots get their nasty claws on your moollaw!! You fight through the horde and escape in a shinny new ship. You look back on your past encounters and your rethinking this whole explorer thing. As you leave the planet a giant robot goes after you. The giant robot uses a star portal to teleport creatures and uses them as projectiles to knock you out of the sky. Final mission, shoot all the creatures to survive. That massive tin man seems pretty indestructible, but those bees don’t. Have fun!

Short Description:

First Mission, find your way to the planet. Use the stars to guide your path. Second mission, survive enemy horde and make it to the ship on the other side. Final mission, kill all the bee projectiles before they kill you!

Use arrows to move and Space bar to shoot.
